霿字的基本解释

霿
méng
天色昏暗：霿雾。

霿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《玉篇》武賦切］
亦作“雺2”。同“霧1”。
[②]［méng］
［《廣韻》莫紅切，平東，明。］
［《廣韻》莫弄切，去送，明。］
同“霧2”。
[③]［mào］
［《集韻》莫候切，去，明。］
昏昧；蒙蔽。

霿字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霿； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1380第01
【唐韻】莫弄切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒙弄切，?幪去聲。【說文】天氣下，地不應，曰霿。霿，晦也。从雨瞀聲。【集韻】或作霧。　又【集韻】莫鳳切，音夢。義同。　又【集韻】莫宋切。與雺同。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫?切，音茂。【集韻】瞉霿，鄙吝也。【前漢·五行志】霿恆風若。【註】師古曰：霿，莫豆反。應劭曰：瞉霿，鄙吝則風不順之也。又【五行志】貌言視聽，以心爲主。四者皆失，則區霿無識，故其咎霿也。【集韻】或作愗???。　又【玉篇】武賦切，音附。地氣發，天不應也。亦作霧。　又【廣韻】【正韻】莫紅切【集韻】謨蓬切，?音蒙。【廣韻】本作雺霚。詳雺字註。

霿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
霿字的起名意思

暂无。

Fei
Basic explanation of words
Fei
méng
The sky is dim: haze.
Fei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Jade Pian" Wu Fu Cut]
Also known as "雺2". Same as "Fog 1".
[②]［méng］
["Guangyun" Mo Hongqie, Pingdong, Ming. ]
["Guang Yun" Don't cut it, go and send it, Ming. ]
Same as "Fog 2".
[③]［mào］
["Ji Yun" Do not wait to cut, go to , Ming. ]
Ignorant; blinded.
Fei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　霿; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1380 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Don’t cut it [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Meng cut it. [Said the text] Under the weather, the ground should not be enough. Fei, obscure. From the sound of rain. [Ji Yun] Or make fog.　[Jiyun] Mo Fengqie, Yinmeng. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Mo Songqie. Same as Zhuo.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Mo? Cut, Yinmao. 【Jiyun】Fun, mean. 【Former Han·Five Elements History】Ai Heng Feng Ruo. [Note] Shi Gu said: Fei, Mo Dou Fan. Ying Shao said: stubborn, contemptuous, the wind does not go well. Also 【Five Elements History】face-to-face, audio-visual, and heart-oriented. If all four are lost, the area will be ignorant, so the blame is also. [Ji Yun] Or as 愗???.　[Jade Chapter] Wu Fu cut, sound attached. The earth is angry, and the sky should not be too. Also used as fog.　 [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Hongqi [Ji Yun] Mo Pengqi,? Yin Meng. [Guang Yun] This is the title of Yu Ji. Detailed note on the word Zhu.
Fei

сущ. туман; мгла, дымка
